title: nuxi upgrade
description: The upgrade command upgrades Nuxt 3 to the latest version.

props.className: language-bash shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme-lighter material-theme-palenight

children.value: command upgrades Nuxt 3 to the latest version.
